allowEditingInstructions: "Allow editing" while students should be taking the assessment.
clearPuzzleConfirm: Ovo će vratiti zadatak na početno stanje i izbrisati sve blokove koje ste dodali ili promijenili.
clearPuzzleConfirmHeader: Jeste li sigurni da želite početi iznova?
completedWithoutRecommendedBlock: Čestitamo! Uspješno ste dovršili slagalicu {puzzleNumber}. (Ali možete koristiti i različite blokove kako biste dobili sigurniji kod.)
dataLimitAlert: The app has been reading or writing to the database too frequently, which may result in unexpected failures.  Please let the app owner know if you keep experiencing issues.
disabledButtonsInfo: Your progress and code will not be saved from December 3 - 11 due to Hour of Code traffic.
disabledProgress1: Any progress you make on your course will not be saved from December 3 - 11 due to the level of traffic our site receives for the Hour of Code during this time.
disabledProgress2: This is why all your bubbles are displayed as gray (don’t worry, your progress from before this week is still safe).
disabledProgress3: We encourage you to try Hour of Code tutorials instead this week.
dropletBlock_andOperator_description: Returns true only when both expressions are true and false otherwise
dropletBlock_assign_x_description: Assigns a value to a previously declared variable.
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_description: Calls a named function that takes no parameters.
dropletBlock_callMyFunction_n_descriptio: Calls a user defined function that takes one or more parameters.
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_d: Declares a variable and assigns it to an array with the given initial values
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_array_1_4_s: Declare a variable assigned to an array
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_description: Declares and assigns an initial value to a variable.
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_desc: Declares that the code will now use a variable and assign it an initial value provided by the user
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_prompt_sign: Prompt the user for a value and store it
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_d: Declares that the code will now use a variable and assign it an initial numerical value provided by the user
dropletBlock_declareAssign_x_promptNum_s: Prompt the user for a numerical value and store it
dropletBlock_declareNoAssign_x_descripti: Declares a variable with the given name.
dropletBlock_equalityOperator_descriptio: Test whether two values are equal. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression equals the value on the right-hand side of the expression, and false otherwise.
dropletBlock_forLoop_i_0_4_description: Creates a loop consisting of an initialization expression, a conditional expression, an incrementing expression, and a block of statements executed for each iteration of the loop.
dropletBlock_functionParams_n_descriptio: Gives a name to a set of parameter driven actions for the computer to perform.
dropletBlock_functionParams_none_descrip: Gives a name to a set of actions you want the computer to perform.
dropletBlock_getTime_description: Get the current time in milliseconds.
dropletBlock_greaterThanOperator_descrip: Tests whether a number is greater than another number. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is strictly greater than the value on the right-hand side of the expression.
dropletBlock_greaterThanOrEqualOperator_: Provjerava je li vrijednost veća ili jednaka drugoj vrijednosti. Vraća true ako je vrijednost lijeve strane izraza veća od ili jednaka vrijednosti na desnoj strani izraza.
dropletBlock_ifBlock_description: Executes a block of statements if the specified condition is true
dropletBlock_ifElseBlock_description: Executes a block of statements if the specified condition is true; otherwise, the block of statements in the else clause are executed
dropletBlock_inequalityOperator_descript: Tests whether two values are not equal. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression does not equal the value on the right-hand side of the expression
dropletBlock_lessThanOperator_descriptio: Tests whether a value is less than another value. Returns true if the value on the left-hand side of the expression is strictly less than the value on the right-hand side of the expression
dropletBlock_lessThanOrEqualOperator_des: Provjerava je li vrijednost manja od druge vrijednosti. Vraća true ako je vrijednost lijeve strane izraza manja ili jednaka vrijednosti na desnoj strani izraza.
dropletBlock_mathAbs_description: Takes the absolute value of x
dropletBlock_mathMax_description: Takes the maximum value among one or more values n1, n2, ..., nX
dropletBlock_mathMax_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathMin_description: Takes the minimum value among one or more values n1, n2, ..., nX
dropletBlock_mathMin_param0_description: One or more numbers to compare.
dropletBlock_mathRandom_description: Vraća slučajni broj u rasponu od 0 (uključivo) do 1, ali ne uključujući 1 (ekskluzivno)
dropletBlock_mathRound_description: Rounds a number to the nearest integer
dropletBlock_notOperator_description: Returns false if the expression can be converted to true; otherwise, returns true
dropletBlock_orOperator_description: Returns true when either expression is true and false otherwise
dropletBlock_playSound_description: Plays the MP3 sound file from the specified URL.
dropletBlock_playSound_param0_descriptio: The URL to a sound file. Can be a project asset name or external URL.
dropletBlock_playSound_param1_descriptio: If true, loop the sound until asked to stop.
dropletBlock_randomNumber_description: Vraća slučajni broj u zatvorenom rasponu  od min do max.
dropletBlock_return_description: Return a value from a function
dropletBlock_stopSound_description: Stops playing the sound file from the specified URL, or all sounds if no URL is given.
dropletBlock_stopSound_param0_descriptio: The URL to a sound file. Can be an project asset name or external URL.
dropletBlock_whileBlock_description: Creates a loop consisting of a conditional expression and a block of statements executed for each iteration of the loop. The loop continues to execute as long as the condition evaluates to true
emptyBlockInFunction: Funkcija {name} ima nepopunjeno polje za unos.
emptyBlockInVariable: Varijabla {name} ima nepopunjeno polje za unos.
emptyBlocksErrorMsg: Da bi blokovi "Ponovi" ili "Ako" radili, u njih treba ugraditi druge blokove. Provjeri uklapa li se unutarnji blok pravilno u vanjski blok.
emptyExampleBlockErrorMsg: Trebate najmanje dva primjera u funkciji {functionName}. Provjerite da svaki primjer ima poziv i rezultat.
emptyFunctionBlocksErrorMsg: Funkcijski blok treba unutra imati druge blokove da bi mogao raditi.
emptyFunctionalBlock: Imate blok s neispunjenom ulaznom vrijednosti.
emptyTopLevelBlock: Nemate blokove za pokretanje. Blok mora spojiti na {topLevelBlockName} blok.
errorEmptyFunctionBlockModal: Mora se staviti blokove unutar definicije funkcije. Klikni na "uredi" i dovuci blokove unutar zelenog bloka.
errorIncompleteBlockInFunction: Klikni na "uredi" da budeš siguran da nijedan blok ne nedostaje unutar tvoje definicije funkcije.
errorGenericLintError: Program sadrži upozorenje koje treba ispraviti. Držite miš iznad ikona pokraj brojeva redaka u editoru da biste saznali više.
errorParamInputUnattached: Sjeti se da prikačiš blok za svaki unos parametara na bloku funkcije na svojoj radnoj površini.
errorRequiredParamsMissing: Napravi parametar za svoju funkciju tako da klikneš na "uredi" i dodaš neophodne parametre. Dovuci nove blokove parametara u svoju definiciju funkcije.
errorUnusedFunction: Napravio si funkciju, ali je nikad nisi koristio na svojoj radnoj površini! Klikni na "Funkcije" na alatnoj traci i pobrini se da je iskoristiš u svom programu.
errorUnusedParam: Dodao si blok parametara, ali ga nisi koristio u definiciji. Pobrini se da koristiš svoj parametar tako da klikneš na "uredi" i staviš blok parametara unutar zelenog bloka.
exactNumberOfBlocks: Only {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}} used!
exampleErrorMessage: Funkcija {functionName} ima jedan ili više primjera koje treba prilagoditi. Provjerite odgovaraju li vašoj definiciji te odgovorite na pitanje.
examplesFailedOnClose: Jedan ili više od vaših primjera ne odgovaraju vašoj definiciji. Provjerite svoje primjere prije zatvaranja
extraTopBlocksWhenRun: Imate blokove koji nisu spojeni. Da li ste ih htjeli spojiti sa blokom za evaluaciju?
fewerNumberOfBlocks: Fewer than {numBlocks, plural, one {1 block} other {# blocks}} used!
finalStageTrophies: Čestitamo! Završena je posljednja etapa i osvajaš {numTrophies, plural, one {trofej} other {# trofeja}}.
generatedCodeInfo: Čak i vrhunska sveučilišta podučavaju kodiranje pomoću blokova (npr. {berkeleyLink}, {harvardLink}). Ali u suštini, blokovi koje si spojio se mogu prikazati kao kôd u JavaScriptu, najkorištenijem programskom jeziku na svijetu:
hashError: Nažalost, '%1' ne odgovara nijednom spremljenom programu.
joinTextTooltip: Create a piece of text by joining together multiple items.
levelIncompleteError: Koristiš sve potrebne vrste blokova, ali na pogrešan način.
lockFollowing: Lock the following stages that are currently unlocked:
lockStageInstructions: Once time is up, "Lock stage" to hide questions.
missingRecommendedBlocksErrorMsg: Nije sasvim ispravno. Pokušaj upotrijebiti blok koji još nisi upotrijebio.
missingRequiredBlocksErrorMsg: Nije sasvim ispravno. Moraš upotrijebiti blok kojeg još nisi iskoristio.
nestedForSameVariable: Koristite istu varijablu unutar dviju ili više ugniježđenih petlji. Korištenjem jedinstvenih naziva varijabli izbjeći ćete beskonačne petlje.
nextLevelTrophies: Čestitamo! Riješivši Zadatak {puzzleNumber} osvajaš {numTrophies, plural, one {trofej} other {# trofeja}}.
nextStageTrophies: Čestitamo! Završio si etapu {stageName} i osvojio {numTrophies, plural, one {trofej} other {# trofeja}}.
numBlocksNeeded: Čestitamo! Zadatak {puzzleNumber} je riješen. (Međutim, moglo se iskoristiti samo {numBlocks, plural, one {1 blok} other {# blokova}}.)
numLinesOfCodeWritten: Upravo si napisao {numLines, plural, one {1 liniju} other {# linija}} kôda!
orientationLock: U postavkama uređaja isključi blokadu orijentacije.
pairingNavigatorWarning: This puzzle was completed while pairing with {driver}. Look at this puzzle on their account to view the solution you created as a team.
predictionInstructions: Make a prediction before you run the program.
projectWarning: Napomena: Vi ste na razini koja je dio dužeg projekta. Promjene izvršene na ovoj razini će se pojaviti u drugim razinama u projektu.
recommendedBlockContextualHintTitle: Probaj koristeći ovakav blok riješiti puzzle.
relockStageInstructions: "Re-lock stage" to prevent sharing of answers with other classes/schools.
reviewResponses: Go to the assessment/survey tab for your section to review student responses.
runTooltip: Pokreće program određen blokovima na radnom prostoru.
runtimeErrorMsg: Tvoj program se nije uspješno pokrenuo. Ukloni {lineNumber}. redak i pokušaj ponovno.
selectSectionInstructions: Select a section to be able to lock and unlock assessments or surveys. Click the lock settings button in the stage to the left.
shareFailure: Žalim, ne možemo dijeliti ovaj program.
shareWarningsAge: Ispod napiši koliko imaš godina i za nastavak klikni na 'U redu'.
shareWarningsStoreData: Ovaj program, napravljen pomoću Code Studio, mogu vidjeti svi koji imaju ovu poveznicu za dijeljenje, pa budi oprezan ako se od tebe traže tvoji osobni podaci.
studentLockStateInstructions: Use the table below to control the state for each individual student.
submitYourProjectConfirm: Nakon slanja nećete moći više uređivati svoj projekt. Zbilja želite poslati?
unsubmitYourProjectConfirm: Uklanjanje projekta poništit će datum prijave, želite li ga zaista ukloniti?
showAnswersInstructions: "Show answers" to put the assessment into a read-only mode.
stageNotFullyLocked: Stage is not locked for all.
subtitle: grafičko okruženje za programiranje
syntaxErrorMsg: Vaš program sadrži grešku. Molimo uklonite redak {lineNumber} i pokušajte ponovo.
toggleBlocksErrorMsg: Trebaš ispraviti greške u svom programu prije nego što može biti prikazan u obliku blokova.
tooManyBlocksMsg: Ovaj zadatak se može riješiti s <x id='START_SPAN'/><x id='END_SPAN'/> blokova.
tooMuchWork: Napravio si puno posla za mene! Možeš li manje puta ponavljati?
totalNumLinesOfCodeWritten: Ukupno: {numLines, plural, one {1 linija} other {# linija}} kôda.
tryBlocksBelowFeedback: Pokušaj upotrijebiti jedan od ispod navedenih blokova:
unnamedFunction: Imate varijablu ili funkciju koje nema ime. Ne zaboravite svakom elementu dati opisni naziv.
unattachedBlockTipBody: Blokovi koji nisu dodani neće rezultirati ničim. Ako želiš te blokove u svom programu, pokušaj ih povezati s ostalim blokovima.
